resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 Welcome to a new year, time for a new version number update.
 
 New Locations:
 Riverside County, CA
 Somerset County, MD
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Weld County, CO
 Porter County, IN
 Livingston County, MI
 Haywood County, NC
 Erie County, PA
 
 General Fixes:
 Sender address filter logic has been changed so that numeric filters must match the beginning of the sender phone number. Filters containing non-numeric characters can still match any part of the sender address.
